comment: Every set belongs to some value of the cumulative hierarchy of sets function ` R1 ` , i.e. the indexed union of all values of ` R1 ` is the universe. Lemma 9.3 of [Jech] p. 71. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jun-2013.)
